String.string: Go to the Sanctum Mysterium in Allemantheia and talk to {@linkcreature:72#1111#Ryshan}.
Read Yasring's letter. Press [ key to open inventory and use Yasring's Letter to read.]
Go to {@Rgn:45010$$Valor Watchpoint} in Thrallhold and ask {@linkcreature:245#1022#Laskan} where Yasring is. [Press key to open inventory and use Yasring's Teleport Scroll.]
"I'll try to catch up to her."
Deliver {@RawItem:45331$$Yasring's letter} to {@linkcreature:245#2002#Mitiel} at {@Rgn:45007$$Vale of the Reaper}.
Tell {@linkcreature:245#2003#Ronalt} at {@Rgn:45006$$Field Base Reciprocity} that you came to help the research.
Ask {@linkcreature:245#2004#Kupan} at {@Rgn:45006$$Field Base Reciprocity} how to obtain the blue masses.
Go to the rendezvous site and find Churimon.
Find {@linkcreature:245#2005#Churimon} at {@Rgn:45006$$Field Base Reciprocity} and locate the shipment.
Investigate the {@linkcreature:245#2012#Mysterium carriage} in {@Rgn:45006$$Field Base Reciprocity}.
Speak with {@linkcreature:245#2009#Ronalt} in {@Rgn:45009$$Camp Insanity} again confirm the progress of the research.
Speak with {@linkcreature:245#2009#Ronalt} in {@Rgn:45009$$Camp Insanity} and tell him what Churimon told you.
You've arrived at the research site.
Meet Ronalt at the research site.
Speak with {@linkcreature:245#2010#Ronalt} and gain information of the Argon Kelba.
Collect samples of argonized plants in {@Rgn:45005$$Skyfields}.
Argonomorph Tuwangis are wandering around the area.
Go to the {@linkcreature:45#4002#Argonomorph Tuwangi} habitat in the {@Rgn:45005$$Skyfields}.
Use the {@RawItem:45360$$de-argonification potion} on an {@linkcreature:45#4002#argonomorph tuwangi} and observe the results.

Observe the {@linkcreature:245#2028#Argonomorph Tuwangi} at {@Rgn:45005$$Skyfields} before the potion wears off. [The affected {@linkcreature:245#2028#Argonomorph Tuwangi} appears after the de-argonification potion is used.]
Go to {@Rgn:45007$$Field Base Tenacity} and get {@linkcreature:245#2002#Mitiel}'s input on the potion experiment.
You see an Argon Structure. Where's Yasring?
Take the path to the Three Towers.
You found Yasring. Tell her that she must return to Mitiel.
Ask {@linkcreature:245#2021#Rancien} why the Allemantheia Headquarters needs you.
Tell {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} that you came back for the new orders.
